name: HMCameraAudioStreamSetting
desc: The options associated with a camera's audio stream.

items.name: case muted
items.desc: The setting that mutes both incoming and outgoing audio.

items.name: case incomingAudioAllowed
items.desc: The setting that permits incoming audio.

items.name: case bidirectionalAudioAllowed
items.desc: The setting that permits both incoming and outgoing audio.
